body:
The pieces I showed at the workshop were indeed Mark's. Definitely worth
checking out.

Christoph

-----Original Message-----
[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of Mark
Stock
Sent: Monday, November 21, 2005 9:27 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
I sincerely hope that those were mine, as I was unable to attend the
conference to see the display. The direct URL to the Radiance- generated
pieces is:

http://mark.technolope.org/image/

Thanks, Ian!

Mark
